quotes.quote: Only peace can save the world and only love can create a liveable earth!
Let us go forth with fear and courage and rage to save the world.
It's up to us to save the world for tomorrow: it's up to you and me.
You begin saving the world by saving one man at a time; all else is grandiose romanticism or politics.
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
With our love, we could save the world.
Anytime you try to be a loving person, you're doing your part to save the world.
To save the world requires faith and courage: faith in reason, and courage to proclaim what reason shows to be true.
The only thing that can save the world is the reclaiming of the awareness of the world. That's what poetry does.
Tell the world what scares you most. Save the world with some advice from the future.
To save the world is the simplest thing in the world. All one has to do is think.
God always saves the world from the consequences of unintended errors of men who live in fear of Him.
Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire.
The best way to save the world is to see every plant and every animal you see as the last plant and the last animal in the world!
It isn’t every day that you get to save the world.
We save the world by being alive ourselves.
We're either going to save the world or no one will be saved.
People can save the world by the way they think and by the way they behave and what they hold to be important.
You need to get up in the morning and say, 'Boy, I'm going to - in my own stupid way - save the world today.'
There's nothing like a mission to save the world to liven up a vacation.
